languages.text: After a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} is used for the very first time in combat, the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} ability used will have its cost reduced to 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on all subsequent uses until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Когда мастер-тактик в первый раз применяет способность своего {g|Encyclopedia:Career}архетипа{/g} после того, как в бою впервые совершен {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g}, стоимость последующих применений этой способности сокращается до 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: After a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} is used for the very first time in combat, the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} ability used will have its cost reduced to 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on all subsequent uses until the end of combat.
The first ability that the Tactician uses after the very first Heroic Act used in combat will cost 0 Action Points until the end of combat.
The first ability the Tactician uses after the very first heroic act used in combat will cost 0 action points until the end of combat.

After a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} is used for the very first time in combat, the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} ability used will have its cost reduced to 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on all subsequent uses until the end of combat.

After a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} is used for the very first time in combat, the next Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} ability used will have its cost reduced to 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} for the subsequent uses until the end of combat.

After a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} is used for the very first time in combat, the next Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} ability used will have its cost reduced to 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} for the subsequent uses until the end of combat.

After a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} is used for the very first time in combat, the next Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} ability used will have its cost reduced to 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} for the subsequent uses until the end of combat.

After a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} is used for the very first time in combat, the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} ability used will have its cost reduced to 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on all subsequent uses until the end of combat.

languages.text: Когда мастер-тактик в первый раз применяет способность своего {g|Encyclopedia:Career}архетипа{/g} после того, как в бою впервые совершен {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g}, стоимость последующих применений этой способности сокращается до 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} до конца боя.
languages.original_text: The first {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} the Tactician uses after the very first heroic act used in combat will cost 0 action points until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Первая {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, которую тактик применит после первого героического акта в бою, не потребует затрат ОД.
Первая {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, которую тактик применит после первого героического акта в бою, не потребует затрат ОД.

После первого применения {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героического акта{/g} в бою любым персонажам, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}мастер-тактик{/g} может использовать {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} своего архетипа без затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.

languages.text: 当任一角色在战斗中首次使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}后，战术专家使用的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Career}职业{/g}能力不消耗任何{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。战术专家后续使用该能力时，也不再消耗任何行动点数，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: After a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} is used for the very first time in combat, the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} ability used will have its cost reduced to 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on all subsequent uses until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 当任一角色在战斗中首次使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}后，战术专家使用的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Career}职业{/g}能力不消耗任何{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。战术专家后续使用该能力时，也不再消耗任何行动点数，效果持续至战斗结束。
任意角色在战斗中首次使用{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}后，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}使用该角色的职业{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时不会消耗任何{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。

languages.text: Cuando se usa un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} por primera vez en un combate, la siguiente capacidad de {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arquetipo{/g} del maestro táctico tendrá un coste de 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} para todos los usos hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: After a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} is used for the very first time in combat, the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} ability used will have its cost reduced to 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on all subsequent uses until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Cuando se usa un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} por primera vez en un combate, la siguiente capacidad de {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arquetipo{/g} del maestro táctico tendrá un coste de 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} para todos los usos hasta el final del combate.

La primera {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} que utilice el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g} después del primer {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} que se use en combate costará 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g} hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: Wenn eine {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} erstmals im Kampf eingesetzt wird, werden die Kosten der nächsten eingesetzten {g|Encyclopedia:Career}Archetyp{/g}-Fähigkeit des Meistertaktikers auf 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} gesenkt, und zwar für sämtliche Einsätze bis zum Ende des Kampfs.
languages.original_text: After a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} is used for the very first time in combat, the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} ability used will have its cost reduced to 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on all subsequent uses until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Wenn eine {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} erstmals im Kampf eingesetzt wird, werden die Kosten der nächsten eingesetzten {g|Encyclopedia:Career}Archetyp{/g}-Fähigkeit des Meistertaktikers auf 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} gesenkt, und zwar für sämtliche Einsätze bis zum Ende des Kampfs.

Nach dem ersten Einsatz einer {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} im Kampf durch einen beliebigen Charakter kann der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} eine beliebige {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} seines {g|Encyclopedia:Career}Archetyps{/g} für 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} einsetzen.

languages.text: Après l'utilisation d'un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} pour la première fois au combat, le coût de la prochaine capacité d'{g|Encyclopedia:Career}archétype{/g} du maître tacticien à être activée est réduit à 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: After a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} is used for the very first time in combat, the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} ability used will have its cost reduced to 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on all subsequent uses until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Après l'utilisation d'un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} pour la première fois au combat, le coût de la prochaine capacité d'{g|Encyclopedia:Career}archétype{/g} du maître tacticien à être activée est réduit à 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.

Après qu'un personnage a utilisé un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} pour la première fois en combat, le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Maître tacticien{/g} peut utiliser n’importe quelle {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de son {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archétype{/g} pour 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

Après l'utilisation d'un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} pour la première fois au combat, le coût de la prochaine capacité d'{g|Encyclopedia:Career}archétype{/g} du maître tacticien à être activée est réduit à 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}が戦闘で初めて使われたあと、戦略の達人が次に使う{g|Encyclopedia:Career}タイプ{/g}アビリティはコストが0{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}になる。これは、戦闘終了まで継続する。
languages.original_text: After a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} is used for the very first time in combat, the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} ability used will have its cost reduced to 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on all subsequent uses until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘中の最初の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}英雄的行為{/g}が使用された後の戦術家の使用する最初の{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}アビリティ{/g}は、ターン終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}の消費が0になる。

languages.text: Çatışmada ilk kez bir {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylem{/g} kullandıktan sonra Usta Taktisyen'in bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arketip{/g} kabiliyeti kullanımının (ve çatışma sonuna dek sonraki kullanımlarının) {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} bedeli 0'a iner.
languages.original_text: After a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} is used for the very first time in combat, the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} ability used will have its cost reduced to 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on all subsequent uses until the end of combat.
